Posts.Content: lap top ( keep friends updated if u are on facebook), change to get daily newspaper, make up ( make u feel good) , fav perfume we girls like to smell nice!! xxx
Posts.Title: What to take with me into hospital for MX & Lymph node clearance ...

Posts.Content: if you add me as friend Jan R Hodge will add you to group xxx
Posts.Title: facebook

Posts.Content: if you find me on facebook I am very easy as the only Jan R hodge add me as friend (facebook) and I will add you to the group , you can always delete me as friend after if u wish Jan x
Posts.Title: facebook

Posts.Content: good evening ladies just a quick note I know that some of us are on facebook and just to say there is a support group called breast friends ,lots of support and a brill bunch of ladies :)please log in xxxJan
Posts.Title: facebook

Posts.Content: hello ,not been on here for a few days , I am on facebook Jan R Hodge and my profile picture is a collarge of a tree mulitcoloured xx if not my email is janhodge1@yahoo.com u can find me that way xsorry if I have missed any one x
Posts.Title: facebook

Posts.Content: HI , had my " lump" removed 3 weeks ago and today I have been given AB'S as my breast is more swollen now than then!!! I have a high temp and to be honest feel cr** ,am having to take pain killers every 2 hours (with my GP'S blessing)  called the nurse at the hospital and off to see her in the morning .also my arm has swollen!!! to be honest I thought it would all be ok 3 weeks on so this have peed me off a little Hugs to all Jan xx
Posts.Title: post- surgery infection

Posts.Content: Can't do the link but on groupon today offer of 3 comfort bra's for £19 they look the same as the ones on the shopping channel   Jx
Posts.Title: comfort bra's on groupon

Posts.Content: thanks to all  yes this has helped  reading what others are feeling   Jan x   J
Posts.Title: looking for grade 1 to share info

Posts.Content: sorry been ranting on other threads , it is good to talk with others with the same grade and approx timing at least we will know we can help each other   Janxx
Posts.Title: looking for grade 1 to share info

Posts.Content: PS all the shorten of words in to just initials also confuse meas to be honest don't have a darn clue what most stand for!!! so spend time putting them into goole to work out what the hell they are :( and still confused :) Jan x
Posts.Title: looking for grade 1 to share info

Posts.Content: HI all, any on here with grade 1 to chat to as feeling that I am a bit alone at the mo with no-one to chat to   many thanks jan x
Posts.Title: looking for grade 1 to share info

Posts.Content: thank you Mistymole, Just a bit confused to be honest ,when I mention it to some people they say oh just a scare then!!! so is it? have to have radiotherapy and as hormone based I s'pos some tablets but the nurse at the hospital is so busy with higher grade patients don't really feel that I can bother her with minor things , Am not seeing the oncology team till next week or the week after and I will prob know more then but... am not sure what to ask did you have a list of questions ?  sorry bit rambling Thanks Jan x
Posts.Title: looking for grade 1 to share info

Posts.Content: HI Louise, Yes it is a bit weird to say the least !! did you have any lymph nodes taken? mine were clear I thought that waiting for results were the worst bit as so unsure ,but have to say made even more so as my first grandchild has just arrived in the world and was unable to drive to go and see him!! it seemed to put a bit of a damp squid on it all  but am now back driving but off work as can get an infection by all accounts. I was told not to vacum for a month to 6 weeks or put the washing out but to be honest that was ok for for the first week but now am back doing it, just have to be careful as my arm which the lymph node were taken does swell. I am based in the south west Bristol/Bath where are you   ramble -ramble Jan x
Posts.Title: looking for grade 1 to share info

Posts.Content: since finding and having treatment on my left boob am convinced that I have a lump on the other one!! went to my gp and he said yes he could feel it but when I went to the hospital the surgeon said that yes the outside was red(allergy to the soap liquid) and did not really poke or feel it , so how do I ask nicely for a scan as this is now making me a tad worried , shall I leave it till 2 weeks when I see the oncology team and say to them . Janx
Posts.Title: healthy breast????

Posts.Content: Annabel, I work as an locum dental nurse covering many dental practices , patients find that views of the sea relaxing along with cute puppies ,kittens etc as most people can't resist babies and small animals   good luck Jan x
Posts.Title: What can help in hospital?.... art?

Posts.Content: Good afternoon, happy mothers day to all:) is anyone here in this area with any info on any support groups ?   many Thanks Janxx

Posts.Content: thank you Kate will look into it jan x

Posts.Content: Hi SC , just a quick question what grade were you given ? as trying to find someone who I will be having the same treatment as? I am now 18 days post surgery and my boob is still very swollen and sore   jan x
